short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search, preview and download books from ZLibrary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for quickly search, preview and download books from ZLibrary. This extension will send requests directly to ZLibrary without any third-party server interactions so you can be sure that this extension is pure as h3ll. It is also open source at github.com/balldk/zlib-extension.
